issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Go to Titanium Studio-> Windows Tab-> Preference->Studio->Android-> SDK Path

h3. Actual Result
It should recongnize the Android SDK path

h3. Expected Result
It is not recognizing Android SDK path
fields.summary: Titanium studio not recognizing Android SDK

comments.body:
Hi, 

I am confuse about your ticket, you are expect that "It is not recognizing Android SDK path"? can you tell me which OS did you use, and if the studio do not reconginize the Android SDK path, you may need browse and point it out. 

Please follow the document to setup the studio. http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/guide/Setting_up_Studio

Regards,
Shuo
Can't reproduce the issue, and the customer is not replying anymore.
